meanings.definition: Making or characterized by no sound; quiet; still.
meanings.sent1: The library was the silentest place in town.
meanings.sent2: The forest was at its silentest during the night.
meanings.sent3: The silentest cat in the neighborhood surprised everyone by meowing loudly at the birds.
meanings.sent4: The silentest snowfall blanketed the city in a peaceful white coat.
meanings.sent5: The silentest room in the house was the perfect spot for meditation.

meanings.definition: Not speaking or making noise; mute; taciturn.
meanings.sent1: She was the silentest person in the group, always listening instead of talking.
meanings.sent2: The silentest student in class never raised his hand to answer questions.
meanings.sent3: The silentest mime at the party entertained everyone with his gestures.
meanings.sent4: Her silentest moments spoke volumes about her inner thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The silentest child in the family had a lot to say through his expressive eyes.
